transcript: This is a bike that also washes your clothes. >> This is a jugard swimming pool where you can actually take a bath. >> Now in America, we call this redneck engineering. >> It's the redneck hot tub. >> But here in India, we call it jugar. >> They have an actual word for it because India is famous for the super clever and simple solution. I love this so much that I want the world to know about Indian innovation. So, we're launching a contest. Guys, there is a competition worth 5 million rupees. There will be 10 winners. Each will get five lakh rupees. >> So, post your best jug and tag us. Just Google Mark Jag contest for all the details. >> Guys, show your power.
